TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(object sender, KeyboardEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed KeyboardEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub KeyboardEventHandler(sender As Object, e As KeyboardEventArgs)
public delegate void KeyboardEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, KeyboardEventArgs ^ e);
type KeyboardEventHandler = delegate of obj * KeyboardEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: 附加事件處理常式的物件。
Docs.summary: 代表要將處理鍵盤相關路由事件的方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中沒有現有的鍵盤事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler>委派。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventHandler> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs>基底類別，當做其事件資料類別。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardEventArgs> 做為更特定的基底類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>事件資料類別。 會使用這些事件資料類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventHandler>委派，因此這些委派會使用現有的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件，例如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
